Package com.PDLB.PPE.API.repository

Interface MeterRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Meter,String>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Meter,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Meter,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Meter,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Meter,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Meter>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Meter,String>
@Repository public interface MeterRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Meter,String>
This interface represents the meter repository, which allows us to perform CRUD operations on meter entities in the database.

  • Method Details

    • createMeter

      @Transactional @Query(value="CALL sp_createMeter(?1, ?2, ?3, ?4, ?5)", nativeQuery=true) String createMeter(boolean isNumeric, float value, String buildingId, int energyTypeId, boolean isOpen)
      Creates a new meter entry in the database.
      Parameters:
      isNumeric - A boolean indicating if the meter value is numeric.
      value - The initial value of the meter.
      buildingId - The ID of the building associated with the meter.
      energyTypeId - The ID of the energy type associated with the meter.
      isOpen - A boolean indicating if the meter is open.
      Returns:
      The ID of the newly created meter.

    • getAllMeters

      @Query(value="CALL sp_getAllMeters", nativeQuery=true) ArrayList<Meter> getAllMeters()
      Retrieves all meters from the database.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Meter objects representing all meters.

    • getMetersByBuildingId

      @Query(value="CALL sp_getMetersByBuildingId(?1)", nativeQuery=true) ArrayList<Meter> getMetersByBuildingId(String buildingId)
      Retrieves meters from the database by the building ID.
      Parameters:
      buildingId - The ID of the building.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Meter objects associated with the specified building.

    • getMetersByWalletId

      @Query(value="CALL sp_getMetersByWalletId(?1)", nativeQuery=true) ArrayList<Meter> getMetersByWalletId(String walletId)
      Retrieves meters from the database by the wallet ID.
      Parameters:
      walletId - The ID of the wallet.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Meter objects associated with the specified wallet.

    • updateMeter

      @Modifying @Transactional @Query(value="CALL sp_updateMeter(?1, ?2, ?3, ?4)", nativeQuery=true) void updateMeter(String id, boolean isNumeric, float value, boolean isOpen)
      Updates the details of a meter in the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the meter to update.
      isNumeric - A boolean indicating if the meter value is numeric.
      value - The updated value of the meter.
      isOpen - A boolean indicating if the meter is open.

    • deleteMeterById

      @Modifying @Transactional @Query(value="CALL sp_deleteMeterById(?1)", nativeQuery=true) void deleteMeterById(String id)
      Deletes a meter from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the meter to delete.
